org.beanio.internal.config

Class BeanIOConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.beanio.internal.config.BeanIOConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class BeanIOConfig
extends Object
implements Cloneable
    Stores BeanIO stream mapping configuration settings.
    Since:
    1.0
